atmosphere.de: Fröhliche Familienfeier mit Lachen, Spielen und Gemeinschaftsgeist in historischer Dorfkulisse
atmosphere.en: Joyful family celebration with laughter, games, and community spirit in historic village setting
atmosphere.fr: Joyeuse célébration familiale avec rires, jeux et esprit communautaire dans cadre village historique
atmosphere.it: Gioiosa celebrazione familiare con risate, giochi e spirito comunitario in ambiente borgo storico

highlights.de: Traditionelle Spiele, Puppentheater, Meeresbildung, Schatzsuchen, Familienaktivitäten
highlights.en: Traditional games, puppet shows, marine education, treasure hunts, family activities
highlights.fr: Jeux traditionnels, spectacles marionnettes, éducation marine, chasses trésor, activités familiales
highlights.it: Giochi tradizionali, spettacoli marionette, educazione marina, cacce tesoro, attività familiari

description.de: Familienfreundliches Festival zur Feier der Kindheit mit traditionellen italienischen Spielen, Puppentheater, Gesichtsbemalung, Schatzsuchen durch Dorfstraßen, Bildungsaktivitäten über Meeresleben und interaktiven Workshops in der charmanten Cinque Terre Kulisse.
description.en: Family-friendly festival celebrating childhood with traditional Italian games, puppet shows, face painting, treasure hunts through village streets, educational activities about marine life, and interactive workshops in the charming Cinque Terre setting.
description.fr: Festival familial célébrant enfance avec jeux italiens traditionnels, spectacles marionnettes, maquillage visage, chasses trésor dans rues village, activités éducatives vie marine et ateliers interactifs dans charmant cadre Cinque Terre.
description.it: Festival per famiglie che celebra l'infanzia con giochi italiani tradizionali, spettacoli di marionette, trucco per il viso, cacce al tesoro nelle strade del borgo, attività educative sulla vita marina e workshop interattivi nell'incantevole scenario delle Cinque Terre.

activity.en: Opening ceremony and face painting station
activity.fr: Cérémonie ouverture et station maquillage visage
activity.it: Cerimonia apertura e stazione trucco viso

activity.en: Traditional Italian children's games in village streets
activity.fr: Jeux traditionnels italiens enfants dans rues village
activity.it: Giochi tradizionali italiani per bambini nelle strade del borgo

activity.fr: Chasse au trésor dans village historique
activity.it: Caccia al tesoro nel borgo storico

location.address: Via Colombo and Piazza Rio Finale, 19017 Riomaggiore SP

seo_title.de: Kinder-Sommerfest Riomaggiore 2025 - Familienspaß Aktivitäten Cinque Terre
seo_title.en: Children's Summer Festival Riomaggiore 2025 - Family Fun Activities Cinque Terre
seo_title.fr: Festival d'Été Enfants Riomaggiore 2025 - Activités Amusement Famille Cinque Terre
seo_title.it: Festival Estivo Bambini Riomaggiore 2025 - Attività Divertimento Famiglie Cinque Terre

specialties.de: Gelato, Kinder-Snacks, frisches Obst, lokale Focaccia
specialties.en: Gelato, children's snacks, fresh fruit, local focaccia
specialties.fr: Gelato, collations enfants, fruits frais, focaccia locale
specialties.it: Gelato, snack bambini, frutta fresca, focaccia locale

age_range.de: Geeignet für Kinder im Alter von 3-12, Familienbeteiligung erwünscht
age_range.en: Suitable for children ages 3-12, family participation encouraged
age_range.fr: Adapté enfants âges 3-12, participation familiale encouragée
age_range.it: Adatto bambini età 3-12, partecipazione familiare incoraggiata

accessibility.de: Meiste Aktivitäten zugänglich, einige Schatzsuche-Standorte enthalten Stufen
accessibility.en: Most activities accessible, some treasure hunt locations include steps
accessibility.fr: Plupart activités accessibles, certains lieux chasse trésor incluent marches
accessibility.it: Maggior parte attività accessibili, alcune location caccia tesoro includono gradini

seo_description.de: Bringen Sie die Familie zum Kinder-Sommerfest in Riomaggiore. Genießen Sie traditionelle Spiele, Puppentheater, Schatzsuchen, Gesichtsbemalung und Meeresbildungsaktivitäten in der schönen Cinque Terre Dorfkulisse.
seo_description.en: Bring the family to Riomaggiore's Children's Summer Festival. Enjoy traditional games, puppet shows, treasure hunts, face painting, and marine education activities in the beautiful Cinque Terre village setting.
seo_description.fr: Amenez famille au Festival d'Été pour Enfants de Riomaggiore. Profitez jeux traditionnels, spectacles marionnettes, chasses trésor, maquillage visage et activités éducatives marines dans magnifique cadre village Cinque Terre.
seo_description.it: Porta la famiglia al Festival Estivo per Bambini di Riomaggiore. Goditi giochi tradizionali, spettacoli di marionette, cacce al tesoro, trucco per il viso e attività educative marine nell'incantevole ambiente del borgo delle Cinque Terre.

photo_spots.de: Bunte Häuser-Hintergrund, Marina-Puppentheater, Kinder spielend in Straßen
photo_spots.en: Colorful houses background, marina puppet show, children playing in streets
photo_spots.fr: Arrière-plan maisons colorées, spectacle marionnettes marina, enfants jouant rues
photo_spots.it: Sfondo case colorate, spettacolo marionette marina, bambini che giocano strade

insider_tips.de: Früh für Schatzsuche anmelden, Puppentheater hat begrenzte Sitzplätze
insider_tips.en: Register early for treasure hunt, puppet show has limited seating
insider_tips.fr: S'inscrire tôt pour chasse trésor, spectacle marionnettes a places limitées
insider_tips.it: Registrati presto per caccia tesoro, spettacolo marionette ha posti limitati

what_to_bring.de: Bequeme Kleidung für Spiele, Kamera für Erinnerungen, Wasserflasche
what_to_bring.en: Comfortable clothes for games, camera for memories, water bottle
what_to_bring.fr: Vêtements confortables pour jeux, appareil photo souvenirs, bouteille eau
what_to_bring.it: Vestiti comodi per giochi, macchina fotografica per ricordi, bottiglia acqua
